root.en: This is an early education application to help children quickly recognize plants and colors! Including more than 100 common plants, more than a dozen colors: red, blue, yellow, green, orange, orange, pink, purple, grey, brown, black, white and so on. Let children quickly remember and distinguish these shapes and colors in the process of interesting and intuitive dragging. The game consists of three modes: plant, color, plant and color combination modes, each mode contains more than 50 levels. The plants covered are: Vegetables: Chinese cabbage, spinach, cabbage, amaranth, leek, artemisia, mustard, mustard, broccoli, garlic seedlings, lettuce, hollow cabbage, broccoli, broccoli, broccoli, scallion, radish, potato, lotus root, sweet potato, yam, taro, lobster, chive, onion, onion, garlic, leek, onion, onion, onion, cucumber, pumpkin, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, eggplant, tomato, bitter pepper Corn, pea, broad bean, lentil, green bean, mushroom, mushroom, Flammulina velutipes, fungus, tremella, almond, abalone, mushroom and mushroom Flowers: Plum, peach, peony, begonia, magnolia, bauhinia, forsythia, lilac, rhododendron, pomegranate, michelia, brandy, jasmine, gardenia, osmanthus, hibiscus, camellia, hyacinth, tulip, violet, lotus, garlic, narcissus, thousand-day red Fruits: Pineapple, strawberry, Begonia, Hami melon, red date, Huolong pear, plum, mango, plum, papaya, lemon, apple, navel, orange, cucumber, persimmon, crystal, grape, peach, melon, fig, melon, banana, watermelon, apricot and cherry Trees: Coral tree, Ginkgo biloba, Holly Ligustrum, Larix gmelinii, Lemon tree, Albizzia cycas, Lagerstroemia, Cedar fir, Laurel tree, Laurel tree, Mulberry tree, Peach tree, Poplar tree, Willow tree, Osmanthus tree, Ficus tree, Maple tree
